name: Troubled Tribe
description:
Goal

This tribe is helpless!!! Luckely you can try to save those villagers. Your goal is to keep the villagers alive as long as possible.

Compete with the rest of the people for the best high score. You can put the highscore in the description with your display name (nothing offensive) and I will update the highscore here.

Highscore: Leonvano 42 days Ludum Dare:

If you want to help me, you can rate my game at the Ludum Dare site (Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/troubled-tribe). I would really appreciate that :)

Download:

If you want to download the game that is also possible, just click on the download button below and it will give you a zipfile with the exe of the game within.
